comments:
version: dtp_0.7M5(RC0)
when connecting to an Inoformix db i try to look at a table with a column of type serial (auto increment integer). in the console i see this:
Unresolved datatype: serial

ecplise just freezes no errors reported.

Jernej,

Could you please provide more details, e.g. any suspicious log file entries?  I don't have access to an Informix DB for testing.  Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks, Rob.
